description: A Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to levitate themselves and non-living things into the air. The user can control the movement of objects after touching them once, regardless of their weight.

abilities.name: Self-Levitation
abilities.description: The user can levitate themselves, granting the ability to fly freely through the air.
abilities.limitation: User must remain conscious to maintain levitation.

abilities.name: Object Levitation
abilities.description: The user can levitate non-living objects after touching them, controlling their movement through the air regardless of weight.
abilities.limitation: Cannot levitate living things except the user themselves. Objects must be touched first.

abilities.name: Environmental Manipulation
abilities.description: The user can manipulate surrounding non-living matter such as stone, debris, and water to create various attacks and formations.
abilities.limitation: Requires physical contact with objects before manipulation.

weaknesses.description: The Fuwa Fuwa no Mi cannot make living creatures (except the user) levitate.
The user can only control objects that have been previously touched.
If the user loses consciousness, all levitating objects will fall.
User cannot swim and is weakened by Seastone and seawater.

keyMoments.title: Fuwa Fuwa no Mi Used for Escape
keyMoments.description: Shiki uses the Float-Float Fruit to levitate himself and escape from Impel Down after cutting off his legs.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of the Fuwa Fuwa no Mi's power in the anime.

description: A technique developed by Luffy that uses his rubber body to inflate his bones, creating gigantic limbs with tremendous power. Originally had the side effect of shrinking the user after use.

abilities.name: Bone Inflation
abilities.description: Luffy inflates his bones by blowing air into them, creating giant limbs with massive destructive power.
abilities.limitation: Originally caused the user to shrink after use, though this side effect was later overcome.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Defeats Largo with Gear Third
keyMoments.description: Luffy uses Gear Third to defeat Largo, smashing him into his own ship.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's overwhelming power compared to the Amigo Pirates.
